plot: Anthony is in the Phillipines visiting his father. He inadvertently interferes with the affairs of local gangster Quino, who also happens to be a champion Karate fighter. After embarrassing Quino near a local tournament, Anthony is beaten up and left for dead. An old monk nurses Anthony back to health and teaches him the ways of martial arts so he may go back and fight Quino again.   Written by  Mike Martinez
title: Karate Kimura

lists.title: Mi infancia estereocatódica: 14 años de imágenes y sonidos.
